ActJudges Act
SubjectNancy J. Campbell ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. David Hector Campbell **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to NANCY J. CAMPBELL, widow of the Hon. David Hector Campbell, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 29, 2015.
